title: Pretty sad
body: Must be an epidemic of 8 year olds playing league. This is the 3rd time I've been banned for no reason besides 3 or more enemy team players trash talking and being unbelievably bm all game and let them unmuted so I had plenty to report yet they don't get punished. Stuck up for my teammate who was being bullied by 4 of them yet riot leaves them unpunished. This game is complete shit and I've uninstalled. I've watched every one of my friends on league leave because how shitty your game has become. No I will not be coming back. Sincerely f$#k you riot and your steadily declining game.

replies.body:
You only get a notification if your report was the last one to trigger a punishment. Which means either someone else got it or the next report will hit them. You helped by building a case on players you report. 

You have every right to quit a game you don't find fun, but your reasoning to do so seems incredibly petty.
Would not mind seeing some chat logs to see how civil your end was.
Tribunal doesn't exist anymore. They have a learning system that adapts based on player reports.
If you didn't care if you wouldn't have posted. You'll be back.

Odd you would mention eight year olds, as the last time I heard "retard" used in an insulting manner was that age range.
Likewsie, for such a "shit" game you seem rather salty.
Cya!  And maybe go get some mental health counseling for your anger issues.

Adult here!  True the age range of this game is like ages 10-40 or higher_, (but that would get very sickening)  _.
I've decide to start over from the ground up and improve my MMR since Riot can't reset that.

If you don't have the ability to adapt to change(which I have) you will not have fun in any online game you own.
